# <code>split-by</code> for default

<div class='command-title'>Create a new table splitted.</div>

## Signature

```> split-by (splitter)```

## Flags

 * ```-h, --help```: Display this help message
## Parameters

 * ```(optional) splitter <Any>```: the splitter value to use
## Examples

  split items by column named "lang"
```shell
  > 
                {
                    '2019': [
                      { name: 'andres', lang: 'rb', year: '2019' },
                      { name: 'jt', lang: 'rs', year: '2019' }
                    ],
                    '2021': [
                      { name: 'storm', lang: 'rs', 'year': '2021' }
                    ]
                } | split-by lang
                
```
